name: Ext_R5_Group_me_entity
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Group.member.entity for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Group.member.entity from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Group|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: A reference to the entity that is a member of the group. Must be consistent with Group.type. If the entity is another group, then the type must be the same.
element.comment: `Group.member.entity` maps to R4B `Group.member.entity`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CareTeam)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/HealthcareService)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Location)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Organization)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Specimen)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: A reference to the entity that is a member of the group. Must be consistent with Group.type. If the entity is another group, then the type must be the same.
